I

IllegalSelectorException - Exception in adk.selectorswitch
IllegalSelectorException is built on top of Exception to offer basic exception handling to the SelectorSwitch UI Component.
IllegalSelectorException() - Constructor for exception adk.selectorswitch.IllegalSelectorException
 
IllegalSelectorException(String) - Constructor for exception adk.selectorswitch.IllegalSelectorException
 
initComponents() - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Initialises the structural properties of various parts of the selector switch which include the base, the dial and the knob.
initialiseDial(int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorDial
Initialises the SelectorDial.dialModeCount, SelectorDial.dialRadius, SelectorDial.modeSweepingAngle and SelectorDial.modeStartingAngles for the various modes in the dial.
initiateKnob() - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorKnob
Sets the default dimensions and constructs the path which can be used later while drawing the switch.
initModesAndColors(AttributeSet) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Initialises the modes and colors for each mode from the resource references in the component's XML code from the layout files.
